pkgmetadata.longdescription: Individual Dose Optimization using Population Pharmacokinetics // Personalize drug regimens using individual pharmacokinetic (PK) and pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic (PK-PD) profiles. By combining therapeutic drug monitoring (TDM) data with a population model, 'posologyr' offers accurate posterior estimates and helps compute optimal individualized dosing regimens. The empirical Bayes estimates are computed following the method described by Kang et al. (2012) doi:10.4196/kjpp.2012.16.2.97.
